e1b0c03b18388ab4412ea3075ffd4ac3b34335d335f68274be703","dweb:/ipfs/QmSknJonWfYAEzNNMFS3JrXwscKYYuvhVXBA2xaULGV9nW"]},"src/contracts/permissions/PermissionController.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbff6025d0119f27dacc44accff557cbf0927e1bc4dd27bca142b121fd5515d38","license":"BUSL-1.1","urls":["bzz-raw://324cfb042a8c2dc427872ff4a7916869cc1b066aa5c54e7fe19c975ef7d59b99","dweb:/ipfs/QmbieuFFzf8L7ZBjS5pX5u3PPTVsFnRR9n8m6rmkUepz3A"]},"src/contracts/permissions/PermissionControllerStorage.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9f9ae448db262028627761ed8c4bd124b36f8ffc98bef8270957c9f1c45728b7","license":"BUSL-1.1","urls":["bzz-raw://2c029fb6727db984d7c56ef1b7eecbe9a9d6b7abacf800e95ce1b83e0662321d","dweb:/ipfs/QmfQfy6eJ4ThVNjG5vevMbR6WWtPeMFAw2BUf6dENsAP3U"]}},"version":1}

acceptAdmin(address).details: Only addresses that were previously set as pending admins can accept the role.

params.account: The account to accept the admin role for.

addPendingAdmin(address,address).details: The pending admin must accept the role before becoming an active admin.Multiple admins can be set for a single account.

params.account: The account to set the pending admin for.
params.admin: The address to set as pending admin.

canCall(address,address,address,bytes4).details: Returns true if the caller is either an admin or an appointed caller.Be mindful that upgrades to the contract may invalidate the appointee's permissions. This is only possible if a function's selector changes (e.g. if a function's parameters are modified).

params.account: The account to check permissions for.
params.caller: The address attempting to make the call.

returns._0: Returns true if the caller has permission, false otherwise.

getAdmins(address).details: If the account has no admins, returns an array containing only the account address.

params.account: The account to get the admins for.
The account to check appointee permissions for.

returns._0: Two arrays: target contract addresses and their corresponding function selectors.

getAppointees(address,address,bytes4).details: Does not include admins in the returned list, even though they have calling permission.

params.account: The account to get appointees for.
The account to get the pending admins for.

returns._0: An array of pending admin addresses.

isAdmin(address,address).details: If the account has no admins, returns true only if the caller is the account itself.

params.account: The account to check admin status for.

returns._0: Returns true if the caller is an admin, false otherwise.

params.account: The account to check pending admin status for.

returns._0: Returns true if the address is a pending admin, false otherwise.

removeAdmin(address,address).details: Only an existing admin of the account can remove another admin.Will revert if removing this admin would leave the account with zero admins.

params.account: The account to remove the admin from.

removeAppointee(address,address,address,.details: Only an admin of the account can remove appointees.

params.account: The account to remove the appointee from.
params.selector: The function selector to remove permissions for.
params.target: The contract address to remove permissions for.

removePendingAdmin(address,address).details: Only an existing admin of the account can remove a pending admin.

params.account: The account to remove the pending admin from.
params.admin: The pending admin address to remove.

setAppointee(address,address,address,byt.details: Only an admin of the account can set appointees.

params.account: The account to set the appointee for.
params.appointee: The address to be given permission.
params.selector: The function selector the appointee can call.
params.target: The contract address the appointee can interact with.

acceptAdmin(address).notice: Allows a pending admin to accept their admin role for an account.

addPendingAdmin(address,address).notice: Sets a pending admin for an account.

canCall(address,address,address,bytes4).notice: Checks if a caller has permission to call a specific function.

getAdmins(address).notice: Retrieves all active admins for an account.

getAppointeePermissions(address,address).notice: Retrieves all permissions granted to an appointee for a given account.

getAppointees(address,address,bytes4).notice: Retrieves all appointees that can call a specific function for an account.

getPendingAdmins(address).notice: Retrieves all pending admins for an account.

isAdmin(address,address).notice: Checks if a given address is an admin of an account.

isPendingAdmin(address,address).notice: Checks if an address is currently a pending admin for an account.

removeAdmin(address,address).notice: Removes an active admin from an account.

removeAppointee(address,address,address,.notice: Removes an appointee's permission to call a specific function.

removePendingAdmin(address,address).notice: Removes a pending admin from an account before they have accepted the role.

setAppointee(address,address,address,byt.notice: Sets an appointee who can call specific functions on behalf of an account.
